1. Work Shop Part I – Duration 4 hrs.

Subject :

(1)All topics covered in Intro talk

(2) Body analysis by TANITA 545 (a Japanese body monitor) with respect to weight, fat, muscle, water, BMR, visceral fat etc. and

(3) To give tips to correct the deviations in the body parameters .

 

2. Work Shop Part II – 3 hours per batch

A Health Awareness Course is a 18 hours package , normally conducted on 6 days. Each day it takes around 3 hours per batch of 6 – 12 participants. Two batches per day can be accommodated.

The daily routine is as under :

Day 1 :

A. Understanding the body parameters viz. weight, fat (%), muscle(%), water(%) etc. calculated on TANITA 545 machine.

B. Dhanwantari Yog – 3 Asanas

Day 2 , 3, 4, and 5

A. Revision of Dhanwatari Yog

B. Discussions on Nutrition and case studies

C. Learn new Asanas of Dhaanwantari Yog

Day 6 :

Learn preparations of various hot, sour and sweet recipes that  are  nutritious. tasty and help manage blood pH  to keep you fit, fine and healthy.

3. Work Shop Part III – 1 day

This is one day course on REVERSAL OF DISEASES – WITH SPECIAL REFERENCE TO DIABETES, OBESITY, CHOLESTEROL AND BLOOD PRESSURE.

A. Duration : Morning 10 am to Evening 6 pm

B : Following points will be discussed in the proposed health Course

Subject  I : Definition of Health
1. Symptomatic
2. Clinical
3. Body Parameter
4. Meridians

Subject  II : Origin of diseases
1. Acidosis
2 Free radicals
3. Chemicals in foods
4. Insulin – Carbohydrate connection

Subject  III : Discussion on Diabetes, Blood pressure, Cholesterol,Parkinson Arthritis, kidney stone, Asthma, and Obesity ( If any person wants any specific disease to be discussed , that will also be considered )

Subject  IV : Food Components
1. Proteins
2. Fats
3. Carbohydrates

Subject  V : Food Plan –
Food plan will be designed for the participants depending upon their life style.

Subject  VI : Demonstration of some foods items ( If time permits )
